publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4757 Sarah Boyack: Organic Food Fortnight 2006—That the Parliament welcomes Organic Food Fortnight 2006 from 2 to 17 September as an opportunity to celebrate the 30% growth in UK organic food sales during 2005; looks forward to the first Organic Food Festival for Scotland in the Old Fruit Market in Glasgow on 4 and 5 November 2006 as an opportunity to show the best Scottish organic produce; recognises that organic farming delivers a wide range of public benefits, notably in biodiversity, greenhouse gas emissions, food and water quality, animal welfare and rural employment, and calls on the Scottish Executive to step up its support of Scotland’s organic movement to ensure that these public benefits are replicated further. Supported by: Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Maureen Macmillan*, Kate Maclean*, Margaret Jamieson*, Bruce Crawford*, Christine May*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Murray Tosh*, Jackie Baillie*, Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Dave Petrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Trish Godman*, Cathie Craigie*, Donald Gorrie*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Rosie Kane*, Rob Gibson*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Chris Ballance*

S2M-4757 Sarah Boyack: Organic Food Fortnight 2006—That the Parliament welcomes Organic Food Fortnight 2006 from 2 to 17 September as an opportunity to celebrate the 30% growth in UK organic food sales during 2005; looks forward to the first Organic Food Festival for Scotland in the Old Fruit Market in Glasgow on 4 and 5 November 2006 as an opportunity to show the best Scottish organic produce; recognises that organic farming delivers a wide range of public benefits, notably in biodiversity, greenhouse gas emissions, food and water quality, animal welfare and rural employment, and calls on the Scottish Executive to step up its support of Scotland’s organic movement to ensure that these public benefits are replicated further. Supported by: Mr Alasdair Morrison, Maureen Macmillan, Kate Maclean, Margaret Jamieson, Bruce Crawford, Christine May, Ms Wendy Alexander, Murray Tosh, Jackie Baillie, Eleanor Scott, Christine Grahame, Mr Jim Wallace, Dave Petrie, Nora Radcliffe, Trish Godman, Cathie Craigie, Donald Gorrie, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Rosie Kane, Rob Gibson, Roseanna Cunningham, Marilyn Livingstone, Chris Ballance, Frances Curran*, Mr David Davidson*, Marlyn Glen*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Pauline McNeill*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Shiona Baird*, Karen Whitefield*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Susan Deacon*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4757 Organic Food Fortnight 2006 (lodged on 6 September 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
